TopicTitle: Argh! Why do my latteral searators fire before the rockets?

Articles.Content:
How do you sort out the order that stuff activates in?

I seem to have trouble getting things to act in the right order.

I'm on steam if that makes a difference.

P.S. It should be separators!
Check the staging order on the right hand side of the editor, parts activate lowest first, make sure your decouplers are above your engines by dragging them
